DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effects of nasal corticosteroid treatment on the rate and extent of intranasal absorption of PMI-150 (intranasal ketamine HCl)
DOC.brief_title: Assessing the Effects of a Nasal Corticosteroid on PMI-150 (Intranasal Ketamine)
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects will participate in a two-period, single-sequence study to assess the effects of administration of a nasal corticosteroid, Nasonex (mometasone furoate), on the pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of PMI-150 (intranasal ketamine HCl) in healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.criteria: healthy adults nonsmoker no drug use nasal abnormalities airway abnormalities
